lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I like to be directly involved in helping people. Micro loans really help.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of show horses and manage horse shows at the Colorado Horse Park.

lender.name: Sean and Nikki
lender.loan_because: Sean's sister Erin started us off.
lender.occupational_info:
Sean works for UW-Madison doing Education Research.
Nikki works for a medical software company.

lender.name: Dennis and Cece
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money to me can change the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: Dennis works in the Department of Urology at Johns Hopkins Hospital. His wife Cece is in college studying to be a school teacher and she currently works with autistic children. The photo was taken at the Christopher Street subway station in The West Grennwich Village area of New York City. The West Village has significant value to Dennis and Cece since it has been the forefront of free expression and art. The neighborhood views all people as equal and does not discriminate against persons based on gender, sexual orientation, race, creed, or religion. It is thereby one of the few "free" places on earth. The local pubs and food are spectacular as well, of course.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you wish to see in the world" - Ghandi

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed in what I have and would like to do what I can for others.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I want to help create opportunity for others less fortunate then me.
lender.occupational_info: Immigration Attorney - I help people who want to move to (or stay in) the United States get here.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I got my professional start through the support of my family. I want to help others build their lives even if they are not born into privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults to help children with learning and behavior problems.

lender.name: Steven & Cynthia
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer missionary construction on churches & church camps

lender.name: Kerry and Kim
lender.loan_because: the most important commodity that we can invest in is other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a locomotive engineer and I haul freight to several locations

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: Helping people to achieve their dreams is a rewarding experience.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I feel more connected to the rest of the world beyond my own small community.
lender.occupational_info: I help people of all ages find the best ways to fit exercise into their lives in order to stay healthy and active.

lender.name: SARAH
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I think this is truly a way for people lucky enough the be born into wealthy countries to spread just a tiny bit of that wealth around the world to where it is needed most.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that stuff gets fixed. It's criminally easy.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are the key spreading peace, prosperity and democracy
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business that helps people with disabilities work from home in call center positions

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to help women realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: High School Librarian

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am an Air Force doctor. I've lived and traveled all over the world and have seen the poverty in many nations. I loan to help people help themselves make a better life for them and their families.

lender.name: Thomas and Cathy
lender.loan_because: Free enterprise and capitalism are the best ways to empower people. Also after 2 trips to Guatemala to help construct an orphanage the need to help in other ways becomes much stronger. I would encourage everybody not to just give money but go and sweat and serve, you will never be the same.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I am "repaying" all those people who helped me during my life by helping other people I come across who are struggling and just need a little help to be successful. I only ask the people I help to do the same when they get into a position they can help others who need their help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach engineers to use optical instruments used in the manufacture of semiconductor electronic devices.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women to take care of thier families and seek fulfillment in their chosen careers.
lender.occupational_info: Small business owner that provides massage therapy to clients who are in need.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: OM

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I like to know that I can impact another person's life in a positive way. Everyone deserves a chance to accomplish the things they desire.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with glasses and contact lenses. I perform preliminary tests before patients see the doctor.

lender.name: www.iacs-md.org
lender.loan_because: to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: The objective of the Iranian-American Cultural Society of Maryland is to preserve, promote and encourage positive attributes of Iranian culture and to enhance intercultural diffusion between other nationalities and Iranians. In addition, we have a long history of helping peoples in need.

lender.name: Al, Jo and Cat
lender.loan_because: We would like to help others succeed.

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: I consider myself a citizen of the world and want to make a small difference in the lives of others. I see KIVA as a creative and considerate way to help individuals and families achieve their goals and self sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work with lawyers and other paralegals helping families in bankruptcy repay their creditors through managed monthly payments. I am semi-retired and work part-time to help pay for my daughter's college.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do: helping out my fellow human beings who need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate construction projects that involve installing generators into buildings.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for all of us, not just a few of us.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals to change the way health services are offered to women.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting fair trade within our global community. It is a blessing to be able to see how my charitable dollars can directly impact individuals in need. I've also been involved with the International Holiday Market here in Austin for over ten years - all products (including Ten Thousand Villages and SERRV Intl.) we sell benefit the craftsmen and communities who produce them.
lender.occupational_info: I work with public water systems throughout the state of Texas to ensure safe drinking water is provided to the citizens of their community. I am also involved with the non-profit Water For People.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am trying to do my part to help other people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a comedian living in New York City. Sometimes I try to make people think, but mostly I make people laugh at the ridiculousness of the world, or just at me.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love KIVA!!

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that invents improved drugs. My job is to develop ways of manufacturing those drugs.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: it works.
lender.occupational_info: I study Economics at the University to try to understand why some countries are so poor and what can be done to bring their people a better quality of life.

lender.name: Andrew and Rebekah
lender.loan_because: We love to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I build companies. My first company is an internet photo startup. My wife writes grants and runs events at a non-profit while getting a masters in Marriage and Family Therapy.

lender.name: Cristin
lender.loan_because: There is plenty to go around for everyone. Hay para todos.

lender.name: Ricardo Oliveira
lender.loan_because: it is good to make people stand on their own feet...

lender.name: Christopher and Maureen
lender.loan_because: We see potential for our small investment to improve conditions for other people.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in the medical professions.

lender.name: Attie
lender.loan_because: I like the international solidarity.

lender.name: Anna-Lies
lender.loan_because: Sharing..... Even when you have a little income you can share this way and help some one who had almost nothing

lender.name: Tania and Brian
lender.loan_because: my brother gave us KIVA credits for Christmas and it has opened our eyes to the world of lending...

lender.name: The Repetto's
lender.whereabouts: El Puerto Santa Maria, Cadiz Andalucia Deuta y Melilla
lender.loan_because: We'd love to see other better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We own and run a baby products distribution company.

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Microfinance Collective
lender.loan_because: We want to help our global neighbors improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of people, organized through facebook, who thought we could multiply our investing power if we pooled our resources.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Nurse and stay at home mom.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others like I have been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I help others learn how to live whole and healthy lives.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: the world is a global community
lender.occupational_info: My role is to help people get a quality education.

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate from my mom and dad for Christmas. I think this is a very cool idea.
lender.occupational_info: I like to write stories.

lender.name: Bernadette & Michael
lender.loan_because: My wife and I have been to the third world countries and we would like to help improve their way of life.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: ppl need to help each other.

lender.name: Evan and Phil
lender.loan_because: We want to help people be successful and make good lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We should share what we have. We all stand on the shoulders of others who have helped us!
lender.occupational_info: I love to mentor young people because of what we learn from one another.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed with a wonderful life. We both want to help other people be given a chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are in a hospital for emotional, mental or behavioral problems. My husband works in a solar energy plant.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupation: Adult/NAV Team Lead, Yahoo! Search Marketing

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives and increase the spirit of love and compassion throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of patients with little to no kidney functon who need dialysis to continue their lives.

lender.name: Francesco
lender.loan_because: if we can help, then we must help.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: God put the need to help others in my way.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I'm sharing some of the many opportunities others have given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work and learn with 10 year-olds and adults in a public school.

lender.name: chris
lender.occupational_info: teach children about nature

lender.name: Tasha
lender.loan_because: I'm also a small business owner & I want to help others successfully support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I make handmade pottery and ceramic jewelry.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: We are ordered by Christ to feed, clothe and shelter those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good that I am contributing towards people developing their own economies.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I am no longer loaning due to Kiva USA loaning policies.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: I have been to Nigeria and have seen how difficult daily living can be.
lender.occupational_info: I work in school with children who have physical and mental disabilities. I focus my attention to what abilities the children have and encourage independence.

lender.name: E.M.C.
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Assistant Federal Public Defender - I defend indigent criminal defendants in federal court. My primary focus is circuit court and supreme court appeals.

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hard worker but I don't give enough back.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: I believe the power to help people can be used in many ways and this is one of them... Each time I can help someone, it makes me a better person and much more fullfilled.

lender.name: Mattie
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to people in need because every one needs a push to go for something they belive in.
lender.occupational_info: I like helping people who need love because everyone needs some once and a while.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have a good life. I think it is very important to give back and help others achieve there dreams. I think this is a wonderful way to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I meet with Doctors and Nurses to educate them on new and existing medical laboritory (blood) testing that may benift their patients.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic organization with a realtime approach and direct solution to combat poverty. I am so inspired with Kiva and will do anything to work with their field partners and worldwide members.
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell apartments in New York City.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I have travelled all over the world and have seen so many people less fortunate than me. It takes so little from each person to help end poverty

lender.name: Ayden C.
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the chance to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: My dad gave me money as a gift for the holidays for here. If I ever have money I don't know what to do with (Unlikely for a teenage girl, but still possible), I want to help people. That's it, really. I just want to feel like I'm making an impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in middle school as of this year and then next year I will be graduating to high school. I take advanced classes, and I'm on the principal's list for excelling students. I hope to one day live in a city and be a writer, with acting/singing gigs on the side.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am priviledged enough to enjoy a regular income and a steady part-time job with few worries over money. So many people in the world are not so lucky. Hopefully with the small amount I have to give I wil be able to help someone thrive in their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently employed in a theatre as a treasurer. Basically I count all the money and make sure everything is accurate. I am also told being a student is a full-time job so my degree is journalism. I hope someday to work for the BBC as a researcher or anchor.

lender.name: Visvaldis
lender.loan_because: Establishing and running one's own business takes courage. I appreciate people who do this, I like them to succeed.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'm very blessed, and I'm able to.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This is the best way for me to help people live a normal life whom otherwise would not be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the social sciences program at high school in Sweden.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: i believe in free market capitalism as the path to world peace and freedom.
lender.occupational_info: We import and sell yachts. Our typical customer started a small business and worked hard to succeed. They now have the ability to cruise the world in luxury.

lender.name: Linda & Ray
lender.loan_because: I can. What an easy way to lend a hand-up!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: One person at a time, helping one person at a time, thanks to this innovative use of technology...thank you, Kiva! I have a particular concern for helping widows and orphans overcome centuries of being treated as outcasts in many parts of the world.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on women with children around the world who hope for a brighter future for their families. I also want to influence my daughter by sharing and giving to others so she may know the full joy it can bring. Though she is only 15 months, one day she will ask about this and I want to guide her to help others whenever she can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer software.

lender.name: Gene & Mary
lender.loan_because: The road to peace is created by eliminating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer networking services that enable businesses to be more productive and efficient.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Financial Aid Office and help University students find a way to pay for their educational expenses.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
John 3:16 My brother introduced me to Kiva
"give a man a fish feed him for a day, teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lender.occupational_info: I work with facility managers providing floorcovering needs.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed in having enough to take care of our family's needs. I feel it incumbent on me to offer people the helping hand they need to also have enough to take care of their families' needs. I prefer the lending system to outright donations (although I do donate to a number of charities) because I believe it's better to help people make a sustainable living.
lender.occupational_info: I manage project portfolios (ie a whole basket of projects) for investment banks in Europe. I've been doing it for over 25 years! I am also involved in a start-up that has technology which turns waste into diesel. In our spare time (the little there is of it), hubby and I like travelling and wildlife photography.

lender.name: carly
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a class of crazy fifth graders or 10 and 11 year olds.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We all deserve a break.

lender.name: Dennis and Barbara
lender.loan_because: We feel that a loan makes a small contribution to the entrepreneurial spirit of people in other parts of the world (People that we wish we could know).
lender.occupational_info: Dennis writes and Barbara publishes graphic narratives for owner-builders, design-builders, and commercial construction managers.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: Money to grow a business should be available to everyone, not just those lucky enough to be born above the poverty line.
lender.occupational_info: I help create tests to diagnose and treat cancer.

lender.name: Lars & Lotta
lender.loan_because: we want to make a diffrence

lender.name: Grethe
lender.loan_because: I think it is great when people can reach their goals!
lender.occupational_info: Managing a travelagency

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Being a nice person leads to being a nicer person.
lender.occupational_info: I run a fair trade clothing company based in Canada.

lender.name: WandaW
lender.occupational_info: I forecast the price of electricity and help people understand how electricity markets work.

lender.name: Nienke
lender.loan_because: Everybody can use a little help
lender.occupational_info: I work for the department of Health, mostly on organ donation issues.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: It 's a good thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I help women who have been hurt by their husbands get themselves and their children to safety.

lender.name: Dawn and Stephen
lender.loan_because: We want to help motivated, enthusiastic, bright people realize their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I create partnerships with big corporations to support the mission of public television in the USA. Stephen represents his company before government.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: I help people with legal issues related to their job or their employees.

lender.name: Carly Zinger
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer .

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: So others can know the rewards of being self employed.
lender.occupational_info: Income tax preparation

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elizabeth and Josh
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to create positive change in the world and for individuals, and we are fortunate enough to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are both scientists who study coral reefs and how humans are affecting the health of the world's reefs. We hope that our work can be used to help create positive change in how humans affect the world's oceans.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to help people that has the drive to improve their own situation and thereby also the economy in their local area
lender.occupational_info: Investing in various businesses

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Because I remember what it was like to need money for a small business, and because I want to extend the reach of my giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a journalist on television, radio and online.

lender.name: Elizabeth Heuch
lender.loan_because: I hope our small contribution can help people obtain a better life.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people and accomplished my goal to make new loans once a month during 2008. Funds I have been repaid have been re-loaned.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: i like to help less fortunate people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Bell Canada which is a phone company located in Canada

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I served for the U.S.M.C. in Somalia in 1994 as a machine gunner. My views of life have changed forever for the better!!!!
lender.occupational_info: It was very hard labor for the US government.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: My wonderful childen gave me this Christmasgift. I believe in helping people by giving them a way to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children from 10-13 years of age.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: its a brilliant way to help people
lender.occupational_info: Managing, organizing and administrating all the services and features Galaxy-News (our company) provides and supporting the community by answering questions etc.

lender.name: Danny Kent
lender.loan_because: I like to help people, and I know how hard it is to start a business!
lender.occupational_info: Developing systems to fit people's needs and improve efficiency!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky in my life and I want to share some of my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an emerging artist. I use oil paints to create pictures of everyday life. My favorite subjects are exteriors and interiors, still lifes and portraits. I'm also a photographer and have been taking pictures since I was in my early teens.
My favorite pastimes are listening to classical music, traveling and spending time with my husband, our kids, my brothers and their families and with friends.
Before I retired, I worked at Whatcom Community College helping students learn the skills they needed to succeed. I was the Coordinator of the Learning Center where students received tutoring and had computers to use for their classes. We specialized in students who were studying English as a Second Language and returning adult students.

lender.name: Vonda
lender.occupation: Chief Child Manager in our household

lender.name: Dawn in San Diego
lender.loan_because: I want to live life generously. I want to help hard working people realize their dreams and make people's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I provide health services to employees of the postal office in the USA.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: KIVA satisfies the giving desires of my heart and my head.
lender.occupational_info: health care

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: We (Americans) have been given so many opportunities and I want to make sure the money is going to someone who is being proactive, such as these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I make a decent living because I know more about a single subject than most people.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: If you can help someone live better and if they are willing to help themself. I do not have much, but I can spare a little. To put a smile on someones face.
lender.occupational_info: I instruct interactive girls/women parties. The hostess and her guests, learn a veil dance routine. I supply the music, veils, hip scarfs for each person to wear during the party. I come to party in full gypsy/belly dance costume. Some parties the quests dress in costume. Other parties they wear jeans and tee shirts. I enjoy my job and everyone has a great time.

lender.name: gary
lender.loan_because: help other people

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have people who cared when I needed help, and I'm a firm believer in 'pay it forward'.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the accounts payable department of a small company.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: Among others, I received a Kiva Gift Certificate for Christmas...by far, the most satisfying to spend!! Viva Kiva! My world has just opened...

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much. I hope to do the same for somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days with my amazing daughter.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: to those who much is given, much is expected...
lender.occupational_info: defending the poor, the downtrodden, and those without a voice.

lender.name: CESO
lender.occupation: Analista de Sistemas na rea de Telecomunicaes

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: If I can help one person at a time, I can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I relieve pain and stress by gentle intentional touch.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: the right thing to do

lender.name: JT
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of micro-finance, and how these loans can improve lives.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit can help those in developing nations raise themselves up to a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: My research is in computer memory: I design techniques to enable faster, less expensive microprocessors.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - it gets the funding directly to the real people who need it most to grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a large group of people to build machines that test people's blood for various problems.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I loan because it's good to help others. I loan because hope demands action.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a good place to live and, if the time comes that they want or need to move to another place, I help find a new person or family to take that home for their own. I take care of people and their housing needs.

lender.name: Mollie & Dave
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to promote social justice.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I am so aware of how very, very lucky I am.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with people & books( but now I'm retired.)

lender.name: Katherine and Mike
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Working with plants, trees, roots for medicine. Growing native indigenous healing plants and food..

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: it costs me nothing and it's a way to help people get on their own feet by their own means.

lender.name: Lorna & Critters
lender.loan_because: A better community for individuals and their families means a better society for all of us. Lending through KIVA is just one small step toward leveling the playing field of life. It is one which I am privileged to take and I hope others will join me on this human journey. Lending also makes me feel good about myself because anything that helps to level the playing field is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: As a student, I am still learning. I attend lectures, write papers and I read a lot. I enjoy what I do and I am fortunate to be able to pursue my dream. Everyone should have the same chance. My critters are Magic (canine), Star (feline), Joker (feline) & Diva (feline). The kittens were all feral & littermates, born in my back yard and later adopted, by Magic & I.

lender.name: The Burnett Family
lender.loan_because: We would like to help make a difference in the lives of hard working people all across the world who were not blessed with the opportunity we have in the U.S. Everyone deserves a chance at achieving their dreams!

lender.name: Evelien
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am a fulltime student of English at the University of Amsterdam

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have lots to be thankful for.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping my husband build our retirement home.

lender.name: John and Wendy
lender.loan_because: Our lives are so blessed with riches. We have not had to struggle in the ways that many others have done and are still doing. It is time we supported the best principles of Kiva
lender.occupational_info: Retired wildlife film maker : International flight attendant

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: There are many people who are less fortunate that I would like to help. I feel like I should be doing this more often.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and first got the idea of this from my soccer coach.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I'm able to and want to - it's a wonderful way to help someone who works hard and it's very interesting and rewarding to read about the vision and spirit of others. How can we not when some of us have so much.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: There has been a lot of positive press for Kiva and Kiva allows me to help someone very directly
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but I used to work for a high-tech company in Silicon Valley.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.Having lived in 7 Countries, including Ghana and Indonesia, this is the perfect way to help the people who have helped us feel at home in their country.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world. Everybody deserves a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 6th grade. I am also involved with the local Girl Scouts.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to make the most out of their lives, and I believe in the goodness of humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I answer questions about everything and help people find information.

lender.name: Kaysha
lender.loan_because: I loan because there are things, like Kiva, which are greater than myself and are helping the greater good.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that coordinates health care for poor people.

lender.name: Leo Wong
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and research how business practice can become more socially responsible and educate business students and practitioners in this field.

lender.name: Wes & Allison
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: If there's any way I can play a small role in helping someone else achieve their goals, I feel it's my responsibility to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an advertising agency that specializes in recruitment. We work with companies across multiple industry sectors to fill open positions they have.

lender.name: Yoko
lender.occupation: High School Counselor, Small Business Owner

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am excited about the opportunity to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 33 years.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do and some day soon I will do the most I can do.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because:
Guided by a basic creed shared by Warren Buffett and the Gates Foundation, "every life has equal value".
Unfortunately circumstances in the community and society structures restricts people's opportunities, which everybody deserves to have. That is six billion people who've got much poorer hands in life than we have. Access to capital should never be restricted.
For the finance literate audience, the return on capital should not be define by only dollars and cents. A number cannot capture the intangible, utility factor of lives being changed, which as a consequence, roots for a harmonious community in the future. Let's do our best to plant many seeds so others can follow and give to others and make our world a far better place.
PS. Eric, you'll always be in our hearts. http://www.kiva.org/lender/soeric

lender.name: lauren
lender.loan_because: We're given a lot in the USA. It's time for us to give back more than we take out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company called PSYOP (www.psyop.tv). We create commercials, but they're not ugly, they're actually really beautiful.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: you can't take it with you

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is a real pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: Helping my company transition to SAP. SAP is a software system used to manage all aspects of a business. My specialty is repair of airplane equipment.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: $25 can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the IT world.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others around the world get a good start.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the stories of people who have achieved their career and life goals. I also love to see female-owned businesses succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst and a mom to 2 small children.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should be entitled to food and shelter and a chance at survival regardless of their geographic location. I believe even the smallest offerings can make an impact globally.
lender.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have a job and it's the least I can do to give someone a chance to pursue a job and help provide for their family like I've been lucky enough to do.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the email marketing and production of multiple children's clothing websites for The Gymboree Corporation.

lender.name: Rubene & Mark
lender.loan_because: Giving a little can make a big difference.

lender.name: Travers
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference

lender.name: Maureen & Robert
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to directly help people who are in need.

lender.name: David & Leighann
lender.loan_because: We believe in the greatness of small acts of generosity.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I want to see people standing on their own feet.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I am a fierce supporter of the entrepreneurial spirit and any person motivated to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Economics & Development at Cornell College, and hope to work in microfinance after graduation.

lender.name: Steff
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach disabled children.

lender.name: Sara & Steve
lender.loan_because: we want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Danny Hile
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a very sustainable way of making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a website that helps people to start their own e-commerce business.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: We all need help from time to time.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs world-wide to improve the human condition.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a software company

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in alleviating the injustice that exists in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help refugees (mainly Congolese, Bhutanese and Iraqi refugees) resettle in Lexington. My job is to coordinate their medical care, organize cultural orientation classes and help them to find jobs.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva money can bypass the usual channels that refuse to open for so many of us.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a collective that produces a weekly television news magazine that is broadcast on several public access and university stations across the U.S.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This makes sense the quality of life that I have will impacted by helping others. In fact loaning here may improve my life experience.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Elana
lender.loan_because: i care about the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: The Fish Cellar
lender.loan_because: We work together and just want to help

lender.name: Dillon R Wyant
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: James 1:27
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and I feel the Lord, Jesus Christ, would want me to help his loved ones that are struggling.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I own homes and apartments, which I lease to tenants.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and I know how important it can be to have a little support at the right time. I have so much and wish to share it with others!
lender.occupational_info: I sing and direct other singers.

lender.name: Macbeth Family
lender.loan_because: instead of receiving gifts for birthdays etc we have decided this a far better way to give gifts. Our children love it...

lender.name: Thori
lender.loan_because:
It's an honor to be able to help, in such a small way, to those who are not afraid of hard work and brave enough to change their lives for the better.
It's pretty random when it comes to choosing loans but I confess to having a soft spot for agriculture sectors due to my own family and cultural roots :)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small medical clinic/office, where I am blessed with co workers and patients who treat me like family.

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a drink.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I am a Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine. I do acupuncture, prescribe herbs and natural supplements, and offer nutrition consultations.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I have much to be grateful for and I want to share what I have with others.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: This is such a personal way to circulate my own abundance and assist someone who is working hard to create their own dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I am a part owner of a small environmental consulting firm specializing in wetland restoration, wildlife habitat assessment, and endangered plant and wildlife surveys.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: There is need and I can provide.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college graduate in Economics with a part time job, looking for a career.

lender.name: Dom
lender.loan_because: enabling one to fish is easier than teaching one to fish, which is better than giving someone a fish.

lender.name: Pierinux
lender.loan_because: I'm a lucky man because I've been born in a country with lots of resources. I believe our welfare in developed countries is also due to a bad distribution of resources. The minimum I can do is to give a little help to whom is less lucky.
lender.occupational_info: Information Systems consultant, I build web sites and work on OpenSource projects. I have lived 7 years in Africa where I still have friends.

lender.name: LOVELACE Group
lender.loan_because: We want to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: What comes around, goes around.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: To give a gift to someone and to make a positive impact on a persons life is very fulfilling.
lender.occupational_info: self employed

lender.name: Slobodan
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: As a Quality Assurance / Process Improvement consultant I help companies and ministries to meet their goals more effectively and efficiently.
